properties.data:
SELECT text FROM FLOWFILE
WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(text) > 20

controllerServices.name: JSON Reader - one JSON per line

properties.generate-ff-custom-text: What is StreamSets and do you know if StreamSets has been recently acquired?

{"request":{"prompt":" Answer the following question to the best of your ability: Question: What will be released in February? Solely base your answer on the following information: The next release of Cloudera Flow Management (CFM) will be CFM 2.1.7 some time in February, it'll be based on Apache NiFi 1.25. At the same time, there will also be the release of CFM 4.0.0 that will be based on NiFi 2.0","temperature":0,"max_new_tokens":150,"repetition_penalty":0.9}}

processors.name: Question to Bot or Text to Vector DB

properties.body: {"request":{"prompt":" Answer the following question to the best of your ability. Question: ${text} Solely base your answer on the following information: {${answer}}","temperature":0,"max_new_tokens":150,"repetition_penalty":0.9}}
